resources.string: Point your phone down at an empty space, and move it around slowly\nWhen you\'ll see a grid, tap on it to place the lake
If you click on the button on the bottom left you can go to your personal collection of fishes!\nThere you can watch all of the fishes you\'ve got!
On the bottom right you\'ll find the lures!\nEach of them has a different affect on the fish you\'ll catch, try them out!
Now you can cast your fishing rod!\nTo do so you can swing your phone forward or you can also swipe upward on the screen!
Something is there!\nSwing your phone backwards or make a long press on the lake to catch the fish!
A common lure used for a common fish
Increase the chance to get a rare fish
Increase the chance to get an abyssal type fish
Increase the chance to get a legendary fish
You\'ve caught something!\nYou can find the fish name and it\'s ID in the upper part of the card!\nTap on the card to check it out, otherwise tap outside of it to continue your fishing!
